Phrase.Text: Ha! The great Drengin Army continues to trumpet their empty battles and minuscule victories...while for all your might, you fail to properly defend your worlds. Best of luck reclaiming the Charon Quadrant, [YourLeaderName]! You'll find us humans surprisingly resilient.
Our outpostss in this quadrant are of a peaceful nature. Your troopsss need not invade.
Our outpostss in this quadrant are of a peaceful nature. Your troopsss need not invade.
